ModMetaData.name: Hold Open Opens Doors
ModMetaData.author: Pope Snowball
ModMetaData.description: "Hold Open" will immediately open/close doors, instead of waiting for a colonist to do it. Settings allow disabling of mod by door type and whether or not a powered door is receiving power. (This is the dev version of Hold Open Opens Doors. The release version of About.xml is available for editing at About/About-Release.xml. Edits made on this file or on the temporary About/About.xml won't show up on the release version. Use VisualStudio to build a "Release" version of this mod when ready to upload your mod!)
